00011 EagleDbSqlSelect* EagleDbSqlSelect_New(void)
00012 {
00013     EagleDbSqlSelect *select = (EagleDbSqlSelect*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSqlSelect_New.1", sizeof(EagleDbSqlSelect));
00014     if(NULL == select) {
00015         return NULL;
00016     }
00017     
00018     select->expressionType = EagleDbSqlExpressionTypeSelect;
00019     select->tableName = NULL;
00020     select->whereExpression = NULL;
00021     select->selectExpressions = NULL;
00022     
00023     return select;
00024 }

00026 void EagleDbSqlSelect_Delete(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00027 {
00028     if(NULL == select) {
00029         return;
00030     }
00031     
00032     EagleMemory_Free(select->tableName);
00033     EagleMemory_Free(select);
00034 }

00036 void EagleDbSqlSelect_DeleteRecursive(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00037 {
00038     if(NULL == select) {
00039         return;
00040     }
00041     
00042     EagleLinkedList_DeleteWithItems(select->selectExpressions);
00043     EagleDbSqlExpression_DeleteRecursive(select->whereExpression);
00044     EagleMemory_Free(select->tableName);
00045     EagleMemory_Free(select);
00046 }

00048 int EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00049 {
00050     return EagleLinkedList_length(select->selectExpressions);
00051 }
00052 
00053 int EagleDbSqlSelect_getExpressionsCount(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00054 {
00055     int exprs = EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(select);
00056     if(NULL != select->whereExpression) {
00057         ++exprs;
00058     }
00059     return exprs;
00060 }
00061 
00062 EaglePlan* EagleDbSqlSelect_parse(EagleDbSqlSelect *select, struct EagleDbInstance *db)
00063 {
00064     int i;
00065     int exprCount, whereExpressionId = -1, expri = 0;
00066     EaglePlan *plan;
00067     EagleDbSqlExpression **expr;
00068     EagleDbTableData *td;
00069     
00070     if(NULL == select) {
00071         return NULL;
00072     }
00073     if(NULL == db) {
00074         return NULL;
00075     }
00076     
00077     /* create the plan skeleton */
00078     plan = EaglePlan_New(db->pageSize, db->cores);
00079     
00080     /* get data */
00081     td = EagleDbInstance_getTable(db, select->tableName);
00082     if(NULL == td) {
00083         EaglePlan_setError(plan, EaglePlanErrorNoSuchTable, select->tableName);
00084         return plan;
00085     }
00086     for(i = 0; i < EagleLinkedList_length(td->table->columns); ++i) {
00087         EaglePlanBufferProvider *bp;
00088         
00089         EaglePageProvider_reset(td->providers[i]);
00090         bp = EaglePlanBufferProvider_NewWithProvider(i, td->providers[i], EagleFalse);
00091         EaglePlan_addBufferProvider(plan, bp, EagleTrue);
00092     }
00093     
00094     /* merge expressions */
00095     exprCount = EagleDbSqlSelect_getExpressionsCount(select);
00096     expr = (EagleDbSqlExpression**) EagleMemory_MultiAllocate("EagleDbSqlSelect_parse.2", sizeof(EagleDbSqlExpression*), exprCount);
00097     if(NULL == expr) {
00098         EaglePlan_Delete(plan);
00099         return NULL;
00100     }
00101     
00102     for(expri = 0; expri < EagleDbSqlSelect_getFieldCount(select); ++expri) {
00103         expr[expri] = EagleLinkedList_get(select->selectExpressions, expri);
00104     }
00105     if(NULL != select->whereExpression) {
00106         whereExpressionId = expri;
00107         expr[whereExpressionId] = select->whereExpression;
00108     }
00109     
00110     /* compile plan */
00111     EagleDbSqlExpression_CompilePlan(expr, exprCount, whereExpressionId, plan);
00112     EagleMemory_Free(expr);
00113     
00114     return plan;
00115 }

00117 char* EagleDbSqlSelect_toString(EagleDbSqlSelect *select)
00118 {
00119     EagleLinkedListItem *item = NULL;
00120     char *str = (char*) EagleMemory_Allocate("EagleDbSqlSelect_toString.1", 1024);
00121     if(NULL == str) {
00122         return NULL;
00123     }
00124     
00125     str[0] = '\0';
00126     strcat_safe(str, "SELECT ");
00127     
00128     for(item = EagleLinkedList_begin(select->selectExpressions); item; item = item->next) {
00129         char *s;
00130         if(item != EagleLinkedList_begin(select->selectExpressions)) {
00131             strcat_safe(str, ", ");
00132         }
00133         
00134         s = EagleDbSqlExpression_toString((EagleDbSqlExpression*) item->obj);
00135         strcat_safe(str, s);
00136         EagleMemory_Free(s);
00137     }
00138     
00139     strcat_safe(str, " FROM ");
00140     strcat_safe(str, select->tableName);
00141     
00142     if(NULL != select->whereExpression) {
00143         char *s;
00144         
00145         strcat_safe(str, " WHERE ");
00146         s = EagleDbSqlExpression_toString(select->whereExpression);
00147         strcat_safe(str, s);
00148         EagleMemory_Free(s);
00149     }
00150     
00151     return str;
00152 }
